msbt.message: I want to be like the meteor shower The center of everyone's attention!
Falling stars are sooo sparkly! I should study astronomy so I can tell you which stars are falling!
NOOOOOOO! I got distracted! The shooting stars were so pretty, I forgot to make a wish!

When I was a kid, I got lost looking for the end of a rainbow.<10_4 /> But I found it eventually! Those things are tr√®s bright up close, B-T-dubs. If you ever go rainbow hunting, take your sunglasses!
I heard a song once called Want to Dance on a Rainbow?<10_4 /> And, yeah, I think I would
I looked up at the sky andnothing. Looked up again and BAM! Rainbow! They can sneak up on you so quick!
Isn't it, like, super rare to see a double rainbow? Sparkle overload!
I took, like, a bajillion pics of the surprise double rainbow!
I want to just stare at this double rainbow forever! Don't leave me, double rainbow!

Did you knowauroras are caused by solar wind messing up the magnetosphere? Did you knowthe magnetosphere is full of charged particles affected by our planet's magnetic field?Did you knowif you have questions, you can look up answers, then you'll know things you didn't used to?I totes knew that. It's pretty great!
I totally want to put on a show with an aurora overhead. It would SO be the best light show ever!
A curtain of dancing lights I'm totes moved. Nature is legit.
Looks like someone's left the island. Something about vapor trails always makes me feel kind of sad
A blue canvas. A straight, white line. Airplane.I'm trying out writing poetry. What do you think?
I've heard there's folks who think vapor trails are really cotton candy.They probs think the planet's shaped like a pizza too
I'm going to soak up ALL of these moonbeams and get chock-full of MOON ENERGY!
Have you ever gone to the moon?<10_4 /> Yeah, me neither
Full moons make my heart feel full! And make me worried about werefish climbing up on land
